Error.transfer: 私有网络数量超过项目规定限额，请先申请配额！

Error.error: NeutronError-->Gateway cannot be updated for router @, since a gateway to external network @ is required by one or more floating IPs.
Error.transfer: 这是清除带有浮动IP的 网关的提示语 需要转译！

Error.error: itemNotFound-->Floating ip pool not found.
Error.transfer: 公网Ip池不存在

Error.error: itemNotFound-->Floating ip not found for id
Error.transfer: 公网Ip不存在

Error.error: itemNotFound-->No more floating ips in pool @.
Error.transfer: 外部网络IP数量不足

Error.error: forbidden-->IP allocation over quota in pool @.
Error.transfer: 公网IP数量已超过项目规定限额，请申请配额

Error.error: NeutronError-->Router @ still has ports
Error.transfer: 路由已连接子网，需解绑子网后操作

Error.error: NeutronError-->Bad router request: Router already has a port on subnet @
Error.transfer: 路由已连接此子网，请选择其他子网

Error.error: NeutronError-->Bad router request: Subnet for router interface must have a gateway IP
Error.transfer: 子网无网关，无法关联

Error.error: NeutronError-->Router interface for subnet @ on router @ cannot be deleted, as it is required by one or more floating IPs
Error.transfer: 子网IP已被占用，不能删除

Error.error: NeutronError-->Gateway cannot be updated for router @, since a gateway to external network @ is required by one or more floating IPs.
Error.transfer: 网关已被路由占用，请先解绑云主机的公网IP

Error.error: NeutronError-->Unable to complete operation for network @. The IP address @ is in use.
Error.transfer: 该内部网络已经被使用，请选择其他的内部网络

Error.error: NeutronError-->Gateway cannot be updated for router @, since a gateway to external network @ is required by one or more floating IPs.
Error.transfer: 网关已被云主机或负载均衡占用，请先解绑其公网IP

Error.error: NeutronError-->Quota exceeded for resources: ['router']
Error.transfer: 路由数量超过项目规定限额，请先申请配额

ErrorList.Error: NeutronErrorBad router request: Cidr @ of subnet @ overlaps with cidr @ of subnet @ --> 选中的外网和连接到路由的子网地址冲突，无法设置网关
NeutronError-->Router @ could not be found --> 路由不存在

Error.error: itemNotFound-->Security group @ does not exist
Error.transfer: 安全组不存在

Error.error: NeutronError-->Security group rule already exists. Rule id is @.
Error.transfer: 规则已存在

Error.error: NeutronError-->Updating default security group not allowed.
Error.transfer: 默认的安全组不允许修改

Error.error: badRequest-->Security Group @ in use.
Error.transfer: 安全组正已被使用，请先进行解绑操作

Error.error: NeutronError-->Quota exceeded for resources: ['security_group']
Error.transfer: 安全组数量超过项目规定限额，请先申请配额

Error.error: badRequest-->409-{u'NeutronError': {u'message': u'Security Group @ in use.', u'type': u'SecurityGroupInUse', u'detail': u''}}
Error.transfer: 安全组正在被云主机使用，请先进行解绑操作

Error.error: NeutronError-->Operation cannot be performed since associated Firewall @ is in PENDING_CREATE
Error.transfer: 防火墙处于待创建状态，不允许修改

Error.error: NeutronError-->Firewall @ could not be found.
Error.transfer: 防火墙不存在

Error.error: NeutronError-->Operation cannot be performed since associated Firewall @ is in PENDING_CREATE.
Error.transfer: 防火墙处于待创建状态，不可以修改

Error.error: NeutronError-->Exceeded allowed count of firewalls for tenant @. Only one firewall is supported per tenant.
Error.transfer: 仅允许创建一个防火墙

Error.error: NeutronError-->Operation cannot be performed since associated Firewall @ is in PENDING_DELETE.
Error.transfer: 待删除状态的防火墙不能再次删除

Error.error: NeutronError-->Source,destination port are not allowed when protocol is set to ICMP.
Error.transfer: 协议是ICMP的防火墙规则，不允许分配端口

Error.error: NeutronError-->Invalid input for action. Reason: '' is not in ['allow','deny'].
Error.transfer: 创建防火墙规则时，动作为必选项

Error.error: NeutronError-->Operation cannot be performed since associated Firewall @ is in PENDING_UPDATE
Error.transfer: 待更新状态的防火墙不能进行其他操作

Error.error: Internal Server Error
Error.transfer: 服务异常，请稍后重试或者联系客服

Error.error: Snapshot Not Found.
Error.transfer: 镜像不存在

Error.error: Gateway Time-out,The server didn't respond in time.
Error.transfer: 服务异常，请稍后重试或者联系客服
